helmet.title: GOLDENMILL is a brand of LKT Group GmbH that supplies technical spare parts for industrial equipment, including dies, shells, rollers for pellet mills of any type, eccentric shafts, as well as hammers, shafts, and screens for hammer mills and separators

seo.defaultTitle: GoldenMill - LKE Group GmbH | Premium Dies and Roller Shells for Pellet Mills

matrix.title: Premium Dies for Pellet Mills | LKE Group GmbH | GoldenMill
matrix.description: High-quality dies for pellet mills of any type from LKE Group GmbH. Custom manufacturing according to customer drawings, superior hardness and wear resistance, up to 10% less wear compared to competitors. Flat dies, ring dies, and twin-track dies available.

shell.title: Premium Roller Shells for Pellet Mills | LKE Group GmbH | GoldenMill
shell.description: High-quality roller shells for pellet mills from LKE Group GmbH. Various surface types (perforated, corrugated, fishbone), custom dimensions, superior wear resistance. Up to 7% less wear compared to competitors. For flat dies, ring dies, and twin-track dies.

spare-parts.title: Premium Spare Parts for Pellet Mills | LKE Group GmbH | GoldenMill
spare-parts.description: High-quality spare parts for pellet mills and hammer mills from LKE Group GmbH. Eccentric shafts, hammers, shafts, screens, and other components. Custom manufacturing according to customer specifications. For granulation, extrusion, grinding, transport, cooling, storage, and electrical systems.

inputInfoBlock.noEquipmentData: No equipment information or difficulty in answering accurately

features.1: The reinforced GM press-granulator body ensures maximum stability and reliability even in the most difficult conditions.
features.2: The overload pneumatic valve and the safety system in the form of a cutting bolt ensure safe operation of the GM press-granulator even in unexpected situations.
features.3: The GM press-granulator's V-belt drive is not only easy to maintain but also reduces operating costs, making your investments even more profitable.
features.4: The GM press-granulator's rotor and main shaft are specially designed for materials with high density and can withstand high loads.
features.5: The GM press-granulator, equipped with an IE4 standard motor, ensures a high level of efficiency, energy savings, and environmental protection.

vibrationBlock.subtitle: Smart early detection system
vibrationBlock.notification: Early warning of possible breakdowns due to increased vibration

sensorsBlock.subtitle: Automation with minimal cable and remote control

characteristics.title: Characteristics table
characteristics.note1: * Calculation based on test values with a matrix ⌀ 6/8 mm. Performance may vary depending on the type of raw material, material preparation, and technical characteristics of the matrix.

features.1: The reinforced construction of the GM mixer-conditioner ensures uniform and stable mixing of components even when working with heavy, wet, and difficult-to-process materials, ensuring high quality of the finished product.
features.2: With a focus on ease of operation: the presence of a service hatch allows quick access to internal elements, and the design with easily removable blades significantly simplifies their disassembly and replacement.
features.3: Optional: the automatic water and liquid dosing system ensures maximum precise supply through the integration of a controller and high-efficiency ProMinent nozzle.
features.4: The specially designed reinforced shaft and improved blade system of the GM mixer-conditioner provide intensive mixing of components, withstanding high mechanical loads and maintaining optimal performance under any operating conditions.

steamSystemBlock.subtitle: Efficient process control
steamSystemBlock.notification: The small adjustment screw enables more precise steam volume regulation

AutomaticDosingWaterBlock.subtitle:
A more precise supply and dosing system
with ProMinent controller and nozzle

about.title: COMPANY PROFILE
about.text:
GoldenMill is a brand of LKT Group GmbH that supplies technical spare parts for industrial equipment, including dies, shells, rollers for pellet mills of any type, eccentric shafts, as well as hammers, shafts, and screens for hammer mills and separators.

The production supports any spare parts in small and large volumes based on the drawings available in the LKT Group GmbH database, as well as exclusively based on drawings provided by the customers.

Every unit produced under the GOLDENMILL brand is processed using CE-certified equipment, ensuring the quality and compliance of the product's workmanship.
